The NESA Africa Awards 2024

Celebrating Educational Excellence Across Africa

Join Us in Recognizing Excellence & Nominate Outstanding Individuals and Organizations for the Prestigious New Education Standard Awards, and be inspired by their stories.

A flagship initiative under Santos Creations Educational Foundation

About NESA Africa

Championing Education
Excellence in Africa

New Education Standard Award Africa (NESA Africa) 2024 is an initiative designed to recognize and honor outstanding achievements in the educational sector across the Africa.

Rooted in the vision of enhancing the quality of education and making it accessible to all, NESA Africa operates with the mission of spotlighting significant contributions by individuals, organizations, educational institutions, and other stakeholders towards achieving these goals.

Meet Our Key Partners

Nomination Categories

Celebrate the unsung heroes and NOMINATE today!!

See all Categories >

Africa Lifetime Education Icon Special Recognition Award

The Africa Lifetime Education Icon Special Recognition Award is the pinnacle of the NESA-Africa awards and the Santos Creations Educational Foundation. Envisioned as the Africa education advocacy Nobel award recognition, this prestigious accolade honors individuals from around the world who have dedicated their lives to advancing sustainable education for all in Africa, aligning with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goal 4 (SDG 4) - Quality Education.

The Overall Best NGO Contribution to Achieving Education for All in Nigeria 2024

Celebrates NGOs that have made significant improvements in educational access, quality, and innovation from 2013-2024.

Africa Diaspora association Educational Impact Projects Recognition Award in Africa

Honoring the significant contributions made by diaspora organizations towards achieving "Education for all" across the African Continent.

The Overall Best CSR for Education in Nigeria Award 2024

Honoring corporate social responsibility by banks, telecommunications, and other sectors, and showing their impactful CSR initiatives that have ...

CSR for Education special recognition award in Africa 2024

Recognize the most outstanding educational technology companies that have made significant contributions to advancing education in Africa through...

Best EduTech Organization in Nigeria and Africa 2024

Acknowledges state governments that have demonstrated exemplary commitment and results in advancing education from 2013-2024.

Overall best educational friendly state in Nigeria 2024

Awards the tertiary institution that stands out in academic excellence, community engagement, and student support with notable ICT infrastructure.

The best library in Nigerian tertiary institutions award 2024

Recognizes libraries that have made exceptional contributions and excellence to educational research and innovation, thus shaping future educational strategies.

The Overall Best Research and Development Contribution by Tertiary Institutions in Nigeria

Recognizing media role in educational awareness and innovation. Awards media houses and organizations that effectively contribute to educational development.

The Overall Best Media Organization in Nigeria with Outstanding Education Focus

Honors exceptional media/news award programs for educational collaborations and contributes to Nigeria educational development.

International and Bilateral Contributors to Education in Nigeria Recognition award 2024

Honoring international bodies for their impactful cooperative efforts that significantly impact the educational sector.

Christian faith organization Educational Champion of the Decade Award

Recognizing Christian faith-based organizations for their outstanding contributions to education advancement.

Islamic faith organization Educational Champion of the Decade Award in Nigeria (2013-2024)

Celebrating Islamic faith-based organizations for their crucial role in advancing and diversifying educational opportunities.

Recognition for the best educational support by a Political leaders in Nigeria 2024

Award for both state and federal government officials who have championed STEM education and technological advancement in learning.

Creative arts Industry contribution to education in Nigeria 2024

Recognizing efforts towards advancing education through creative arts and dedication to achieving quality education under SDG 4 objectives.

Support for education in STEM in Nigeria 2024

Celebrating initiatives by any organization for creative arts role in education and promoting hands-on learning experiences.

Meet The Judges

Get to know the NESA Judges, their background, and acheivements

Get Involved

Becoming a member of NESA can help you fulfil your desire to improve the world by giving back to the community in your own unique way.

Sponsorship

Support the NESA Africa 2024 Awards by becoming a Sponsor. Our sponsorship packages offer valuable benefits and exposure at one of the most prestigious educational award ceremonies in Africa.

Volunteer

You can become a part of a ground breaking moment and history by choosing to volunteer for us at NESA, whatever your background or skills may be, your help is needed in organizing the award ceremony. This would serve as a fantastic opportunity to meet some of the leading figures in African Education

Become a Member

Join our growing global community and celebrate excellence in learning. By becoming a member of our organization, you'll directly contribute to recognizing outstanding educators across the globe, Together, we elevate the standards of education and empower educators.

NESA Africa 2024 Award Timelines

July - August

2024

Nominate Your Education Champion

  • Launch of the nomination process on the NNESA digital platform. Inviting entries from eligible participants across various categories
  • Continuous collection of nominations, allowing participants to submit their applications along with supporting documents and evidence of work.

August

2024

Nomination closes & Internal Screening Proceeds

  • Closure of the nomination process followed by initial screening to ensure compliance with the criteria and requirements

September

2024

Public Voting Proceeds & Judging Period

  • Shortlisted nominees will be requested to upload detailed presentations or portfolios on the NNESA digital platform for pre- screening by the judges
  • A panel of judges reviews the submissions to determine the recipients of the Platinum Awards in each cate

Oct - Nov

2024

The Award Ceremony and Winner Announcements

  • Final preparations for the awards ceremony, including logistics, guest management, and media arrangements.
  • Hosting the grand awards ceremony, announcing the winners, and celebrating their achievement on Oct 16, 2024
